title.rendered: Boost Your Organic Marketing Efforts With Pay Per Click Advertising

content.rendered: Did you know? the top 3 paid advertising spots get 46% of overall clicks. Why Make PPC a part of your online marketing strategy?

excerpt.rendered: Did you know? the top 3 paid advertising spots get 46% of overall clicks. Why Make PPC a part of your online marketing strategy?
